description:
MiniSquadron is a frantic shooter involving lots of little planes all vying for supremacy of the skies! Perform loop-the-loops, Immelmann turns and other daring feats of aerial shenanigans with a super fluid control system - experience the joy of freedom in the air!

--------------------------------------
"Mini Squadron is one of the most fun experiences and is not only the best flying game, but already one of the top five games overall" - AppAdvice.com

"MiniSquadron can be thoroughly recommended both to those who wish to take a trip down memory lane and to those who are new to the 2D dog-fighting genre" - TouchArcade.com

"What's most important, though, is that MiniSquadron feels really sweet to play while encouraging addictive replay" - PocketGamer.co.uk

"Here is an obviously polished game, with smooth animation, oddly fitting classical music, and graphics as colorful as a bag of Skittles" - SlideToPlay.com
--------------------------------------

Shoot down enemy planes, bombers, UFOs, ducks, collect a plethora of power-ups - and unlock over 50 types of planes with different weapon types! There's nothing quite like this on the iPhone!

====================================
FEATURES:
====================================
- Intuitive touch controls.
- Stunning graphics and art.
- Over 50 planes to unlock and collect.
- 8 Levels of intense combat.
- 7 different types of weapon to use including BIG Laser!
- Ducks, Seagulls, UFOs, Devil Planes, Squids!
- Fluid gameplay systems based on physics
- More than 8 different pick-ups.
- Addictive Multiplier System for advanced players.
- Rock out to the genius of Mozart, Beethoven, Tchaichovsky and other dead composers.

Use these links to keep up to date with news and other amusing thoughts on MiniSquadron and possibly other things (like cats and ramen):
www.supermono-studios.com
www.minisquadron.com
twitter.com/mrfungfung
